color_a.name: Fluorescent Orange
color_a.use: Gus body, lava glow, warm elements

character.name: Gus
character.visual_prompt: A small gecko with a round head, big curious eyes, stubby legs, and a distinctive CURLY SPIRAL TAIL. Body is solid orange, belly is yellow. Bold black outlines. Simple cartoon style.

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Gus the orange gecko standing at the BASE of a tall mountain, looking up curiously. Smoke puffs rising from the distant peak. Gus has a distinctive CURLY SPIRAL TAIL. Blue sky, green grass at base. Expression: curious, wondering what's up there.

pages.text: Gus sat on a big rock.
pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Gus the orange gecko sitting peacefully on a gray rock in a grassy meadow. Mountain visible in far background with tiny smoke puffs at top. Curly spiral tail relaxed. Expression: content, peaceful day.

WIDE SHOT: Gus standing in foreground, pointing up at a large mountain in the distance. Small puffs of smoke coming from the peak. Curly spiral tail perked with interest. Expression: curious, noticing something interesting far away.

MEDIUM SHOT: Gus shielding his eyes with one hand, looking up at wisps of smoke rising from the mountain peak. Curly spiral tail alert. Expression: intrigued, pointing at the smoke. Mountain in background, smoke clearly visible.
CLOSE-UP: Gus with determined, excited expression. Fist raised in the air. Curly spiral tail bouncing with enthusiasm. Solid warm background. BIG catchphrase energy - he's decided to explore!
DYNAMIC SHOT: Gus running up a grassy hillside path toward the mountain. Curly spiral tail streaming behind. Legs in motion, joyful running. Mountain looming ahead. Expression: happy, adventurous.
WIDE SHOT: Gus climbing higher on the rocky mountain slope. Getting smaller as terrain gets steeper. Smoke wisps above him. Curly spiral tail visible. Expression: determined, focused on climbing.

MEDIUM SHOT: Gus standing proudly at the crater RIM, looking DOWN into it from the EDGE. He is on solid rock, peering over. Curly spiral tail curled with excitement. Warm orange glow from below illuminating his face. Expression: amazed, eyes wide.

CLOSE-UP: Gus feeling the heat - wiping brow, fanning himself. Standing safely on the rocky rim. Orange glow from below. Curly spiral tail drooping from heat. Expression: surprised by warmth, sweating a little.

OVER-SHOULDER SHOT: View from behind Gus as he peers DOWN into the crater. We see bubbling orange lava FAR BELOW in the crater. Gus is safely on the rim looking down. Curly spiral tail visible. Expression: wonder and amazement.
EXTREME CLOSE-UP: Gus's face filling the frame. MAXIMUM amazement - eyes huge, mouth open in awe. Orange glow reflecting on his face from below. This is THE catchphrase moment - pure wonder!

pages.text: HISS! PUFF! The smoke got big!
pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: The volcano releasing a big puff of smoke and steam. Gus stepping back from the rim, startled. Curly spiral tail standing straight with alarm. He's still safely on the rim but backing away. Expression: surprised, alert.
MEDIUM SHOT: Gus turning to leave, looking back at the smoking crater one more time. Smart gecko knows when to go. Curly spiral tail swishing. Expression: satisfied but sensible - time to head down.

DYNAMIC SHOT: Gus running/sliding down the mountain path happily. Not panicked - just energetic descent. Curly spiral tail streaming. Smoke from volcano visible in background. Expression: happy, bouncy run downhill.

MEDIUM SHOT: Gus back at his original rock in the meadow, sitting down with satisfaction. Mountain with gentle smoke visible in far background. Curly spiral tail relaxed and curled. Expression: content, happy to be back.
CLOSE-UP: Gus with a knowing, happy smile. Looking at viewer, sharing his adventure. Curly spiral tail making a happy curl. Warm sunset colors. Expression: proud, satisfied, what an adventure!
WIDE SHOT: Gus waving goodbye from his rock. Mountain peaceful with gentle smoke in background. Sunset sky. Curly spiral tail waving too. Expression: friendly wave, happy ending.
